title: Assets
description: A set of game assets and constants for `smawg`.

$schema.description: An optional reference to `smawg/assets_schema/assets.json`. Useful for your editor.

name.description: An optional name of this particular set of assets.

description.description: An optional description of this particular set of assets.

min_n_players.description: The maximum allowed number of players in this particular game setup.

max_n_players.description: The minimum allowed number of players in this particular game setup.

n_coins_on_start.description: The number of coins at the start of the game.

n_selectable_combos.description: The number of revealed combos at any given time, each available for players to select.

n_turns.description: The number of turns, after which the game ends.

abilities.description: A list of abilities available in the game.

races.description: A list of races available in the game.
